name: Shao-Yuan Lo
content: Shao-Yuan Lo Shao-Yuan Lo   羅紹元 I am an Assistant Professor at National Taiwan University. My research interests include Trustworthy AI, Machine Learning, and Multimodal Models, with a recent focus on Multimodal Large Language Models and Reasoning. Prior to joining NTU, I was a Research Scientist at the Honda Research Institute USA. I received my Ph.D. from Johns Hopkins University in 2023, and my M.S. and B.S. degrees from National Chiao Tung University in 2019 and 2017, respectively. I also had wonderful experiences as an Applied Scientist Intern with the Amazon Just Walk Out team in summer 2022 and the Amazon Astro team in summer 2021.
